code: import React from"react";import ExperienceData from"../Data/ExperienceData";import{VerticalTimeline,VerticalTimelineElement}from"react-vertical-timeline-component";import"react-vertical-timeline-component/style.min.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Experience=()=>{let workIcon={background:"#c3a6a0"};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"h-screen lg:flex lg:flex-col lg:items-center lg:justify-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-center text-6xl text-choco font-extrabold",children:"Experience"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(VerticalTimeline,{children:ExperienceData.map(data=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(VerticalTimelineElement,{date:data.date,dateClassName:"date",iconStyle:workIcon,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"vertical-timeline-element-title font-bold text-lg",children:data.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"text-brown",children:data.company}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"font-light",children:data.description})]},data.key))})]});};export default Experience;
